plugin.name: leos_checker
plugin.author: Leos
plugin.purpose: A plugin to make checking in game stats quicker. Type leos help for mor information.
plugin.description: * Leos_checker Version 2.1. The following command are supported: alt + h to display HP. alt + x to display amount of xp needed to advance. alt + b to display buffs if any. alt + d to display debuffs if any. alt + g to display gold in hand also gold in bank. alt + t to display target and it's condition. alt + m to display MP. alt+q to display monster skills (for monster race only) alt+c to display L'Cie-related information (for the L'Cie race only) alt+z to display berserker Fury, set berserk prompt with !setpromptb Contact Eighteen in uossmud if you want more feature.

trigger.match: You enter The UnOfficial SquareSoft MUD.
trigger.send: monsterskills="No monsterskills" lcie="No L'Cie info" Send("hp 1")

trigger.match: ^Prompt: hp: (\d+)/(\d+) sp: (\d+)/(\d+) xp: -?\d+ tnl: (-?\d+) target: .+ \(hp: (.+)/10 (.+)\) buffs: .+ debuffs: .+ Gold: (\d+) Bank: (\d+)$
trigger.send: chp = %1 fhp = %2 cmp = %3 fmp = %4 xptnl = %5 targetCondition = "%6" targetLongCondition = "%7" gold = %8 bankGold = %9

trigger.match: ^Prompt: hp: \d+/\d+ sp: \d+/\d+ xp: -?\d+ tnl: -?\d+ target: .+ \(hp: .+/10 .+\) buffs: (.+) debuffs: (.+) Gold: \d+ Bank: \d+$

alias.send: Send("hpset Prompt: hp: $$tok_hp$$/$$tok_maxhp$$ sp: $$tok_sp$$/$$tok_maxsp$$ xp: $$tok_xp$$ tnl: $$tok_xpnl$$ target: $$tok_target$$ (hp: $$tok_target_condition$$/10 $$tok_longcondition$$) buffs: $$tok_buffs$$ debuffs: $$tok_debuffs$$ Gold: $$tok_gold$$ Bank: $$tok_gold_bank$$$$tok_newline$$Fury: $$tok_berserker_fury$$/$$tok_berserker_max_fury$$") Note("HP bar Set with additional Fury tokens. Please use !setprompt if the character is not of berserker job and !setpromptl if the character is a L'Cie")

Send("hpset Prompt: hp: $$tok_hp$$/$$tok_maxhp$$ sp: $$tok_sp$$/$$tok_maxsp$$ xp: $$tok_xp$$ tnl: $$tok_xpnl$$ target: $$tok_target$$ (hp: $$tok_target_condition$$/10 $$tok_longcondition$$) buffs: $$tok_buffs$$ debuffs: $$tok_debuffs$$ Gold: $$tok_gold$$ Bank: $$tok_gold_bank$$$$tok_newline$$") Note("HP bar Set. Please use !setpromptm if the character is of the monster race, and !setpromptl if the character is a L'Cie")

Send("hpset Prompt: hp: $$tok_hp$$/$$tok_maxhp$$ sp: $$tok_sp$$/$$tok_maxsp$$ xp: $$tok_xp$$ tnl: $$tok_xpnl$$ target: $$tok_target$$ (hp: $$tok_target_condition$$/10 $$tok_longcondition$$) buffs: $$tok_buffs$$ debuffs: $$tok_debuffs$$ Gold: $$tok_gold$$ Bank: $$tok_gold_bank$$$$tok_newline$$Monsterskills: $$tok_monsterskills$$") Note("HP bar Set with additional monsterskill tokens. Please use !setprompt if the character is not of monster race, and !setpromptl if the character is a L'Cie")

Send("hpset Prompt: hp: $$tok_hp$$/$$tok_maxhp$$ sp: $$tok_sp$$/$$tok_maxsp$$ xp: $$tok_xp$$ tnl: $$tok_xpnl$$ target: $$tok_target$$ (hp: $$tok_target_condition$$/10 $$tok_longcondition$$) buffs: $$tok_buffs$$ debuffs: $$tok_debuffs$$ Gold: $$tok_gold$$ Bank: $$tok_gold_bank$$$$tok_newline$$L'Cie: $$tok_lcie_full$$") Note("HP bar Set with additional L'Cie tokens. Please use !setprompt if the character is not of monster race, and !setpromptm if the character is a monster")
Execute("tts_interrupt You have "..gold.." gold in hand and "..bankGold.." gold in the bank.")
if "%1" == "buffs" then Execute("tts_interrupt Buffs: "..buffs.."") else Execute("tts_interrupt Debuffs: "..debuffs.."") end

muclient.script:
function OnHelp () world.Note (world.GetPluginInfo (world.GetPluginID (), 3)) end
Accelerator("alt+h", "ttshp") Accelerator("alt+m", "ttsmp") Accelerator("alt+g", "ttsgold") Accelerator("alt+t", "ttstarget") Accelerator("alt+x", "ttstnl") Accelerator("alt+b", "ttsbuffs") Accelerator("alt+d", "ttsdebuffs") Accelerator("alt+q", "ttsmsk") Accelerator("alt+c", "ttslc") Accelerator("alt+z", "ttsfury")
chp = 0 fhp = 0 cmp = 0 fmp = 0 targetCondition = 0 targetLongCondition = 0 gold = 0 bankGold = 0 xptnl = 0 buffs = 0 debuffs = 0 monsterskills="No monsterskills" lcie="No L'Cie info" fury = "Furious"
